mapper.insert: insert into SeoPrice (TaskId, FromRank, ToRank, PriceOri, Price) values (#{taskid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fromrank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{torank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priceori,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select TaskId, FromRank, ToRank, PriceOri, Price from SeoPrice
